title: 7.2.3 Implement EC2Scanner with rules
body:
## Parent Issue
#30 - 7.2 Security Scanner Engine

## Objective
Implement EC2 security scanner with security group, IMDSv2, encryption rules.

## Rules
- EC2_001: SG Allows 0.0.0.0/0 SSH (Critical)
- EC2_002: SG Allows 0.0.0.0/0 RDP (Critical)
- EC2_003: Not Using IMDSv2 (High)
- EC2_004: EBS Volume Not Encrypted (High)
- EC2_005: Instance Has Public IP (Medium)

## Files to Create
- `src/cloud_optimizer/scanners/ec2.py`
- `src/cloud_optimizer/scanners/rules/ec2_rules.py`

## Estimated Time: 3 hours
